title: Feature Request
description: Submit a new feature request for our product

messages.content: Welcome to the Feature Request system! I'll help you submit a new feature request. Let me gather some information from you.
What would you like to name this feature?

validation.errorMessage: Feature name must be between 3 and 100 characters.

messages.content: Please describe the feature in detail. What problem does it solve?

validation.errorMessage: Description must be between 10 and 500 characters.

messages.content: What is the priority level for this feature?
When would you like this feature to be released?
Thank you for your feature request! I've recorded all the details. Our team will review it and get back to you soon.
Would you like to submit this feature request now?
